content: wrap up in the coziness of this crochet hooded scarf this on-trend accessory is made using fuzzy bernat fluffee and features simple techniques including chain single_crochet and slip_stitch fashionable balaclavas are all the rage this season making this a practical and stylish accessory to showcase your style materials bernat® fluffee™ 9 8 oz/280 g 415 yds/380 m contrast a ocean depths 11008 2 balls or 830 yds/760 m contrast b amethyst awe 11012 1 ball or 63 yds/57 5 m measurements approx 12 30 5 cm wide x 100 254 cm long excluding hood
